scripts.wasm:build: cargo build --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --profile wasm && wasm-bindgen --out-dir pkg --target web --weak-refs --reference-types --split-linked-modules ../../target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/wasm/video_player.wasm && wasm-opt -Oz -o ./pkg/video_player_bg.wasm ./pkg/video_player_bg.wasm --enable-reference-types
scripts.wasm:build:dev: cargo build --target wasm32-unknown-unknown && wasm-bindgen --out-dir pkg --target web --weak-refs --reference-types --split-linked-modules ../../target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/debug/video_player.wasm
scripts.wasm:watch: cargo watch --watch src --watch Cargo.toml -s "pnpm run wasm:build:dev"
scripts.build: pnpm run clean && pnpm run wasm:build && tsc && vite build
scripts.lint: prettier --check "**/*" -u && eslint . --ext .js,.ts && cargo +nightly fmt --check && cargo +nightly clippy -- -D warnings
